data.name: CooperationCancelled
data.value:
We regret to inform you that the collaboration for "{0}" advertisement has been cancelled by "{1}".
We understand that circumstances change, and we hope you'll find another opportunity that aligns with your goals.
Thank you for being a part of our community.
Best regards, The Trendlink team.

data.name: CooperationCompleted
data.value:
Your advertisement has been confirmed by the {0}
Great job on completing cooperation for "{1}" advertisement successfully! Your effort and dedication are appreciated.
Thank you for being an integral part of our community.
Best regards, The Trendlink team.

data.name: CooperationConfirmed
data.value:
Great news! Your collaboration request for "{0}" advertisement has been confirmed.
We're thrilled to see this partnership come to life. Stay tuned for updates and further instructions from {1}.
Let's make this a successful collaboration!
Best regards, The Trendlink team.

data.name: CooperationDone
data.value:
The {0} has notified us that your advertisement is complete.
Please review the final work for "{1}" advertisement and confirm its completion. Your approval is essential to finalize this collaboration.
Thank you for your cooperation!
Best regards, The Trendlink team.

data.name: CooperationPending
data.value:
Hello, {0}
You've been invited to collaborate on Trendlink for "{1}" advertisement!
We're excited about the potential of this partnership and hope you are too. Please review the details and confirm your participation or decline if it doesn't align with your current goals.
Thank you for considering this opportunity to connect and collaborate.
Best regards, The Trendlink team.

data.name: CooperationRejected
data.value:
We're sorry to inform you that your collaboration request for "{0}" advertisement was declined.
While this opportunity didn't work out, there are many other potential partners on Trendlink. Keep exploring and don't hesitate to submit new requests.
We appreciate your enthusiasm and look forward to your next collaboration.
Best regards, The Trendlink team.

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value:
Hello, {0}
Welcome to Trendlink, the ultimate platform for bloggers to connect, collaborate, and grow!
We're thrilled to have you join our community. At Trendlink, we believe in the power of collaboration and the magic that happens when like-minded individuals come together.
Here are a few things you can do to get started: 1. Complete your profile: Let the community know more about you. 2. Explore collaboration opportunities: Browse through current cooperation requests or make your own. 3. Connect with others: Follow your favorite bloggers and start building your network.
Thank you for joining us!
Best regards, The Trendlink team.
